settings.text: Free Shipping on all orders over $25

settings.title: Man Cream Made to Moisturize
settings.text: You want to feel refreshed and invigorated? Well, with Man Cream, you won’t just smell amazing, your skin will be healthier, more nourished – even radiant.

settings.title: It’s Time To Get The Right Stuff For Your Junk
settings.text: Because you're worth it, my man. We ship it right to your door. And with a 100% satisfaction guarantee, if it's not the best cream you've ever used, it's on us. Real care, for real men.

settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

settings.title: Hey Fellas… Did Your Balls Bring You Here?
settings.text: It's like your nether regions sent out a Bat-Signal, calling for help, and voila – you've arrived at our website… Your balls know when they need some TLC. And now is that time, Friend.

settings.icon_banners_1_text2: Free Shipping on all orders from the US or orders of $ 99 or more.
settings.icon_banners_2_text2: Contact us 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
settings.icon_banners_3_text2: Simply return it within 24 days for an exchange.
